member.summary: Connect to the EV3 brick with a specified polling time.

member.name: P:Lego.Ev3.Core.Brick.Ports
member.summary: Input and output ports on LEGO EV3 brick

member.summary: Buttons on the face of the LEGO EV3 brick

member.name: P:Lego.Ev3.Core.Brick.DirectCommand
member.summary: Send "direct commands" to the EV3 brick. These commands are executed instantly and are not batched.

member.name: P:Lego.Ev3.Core.Brick.SystemCommand
member.summary: Send "system commands" to the EV3 brick. These commands are executed instantly and are not batched.

member.name: P:Lego.Ev3.Core.Brick.BatchCommand
member.summary: Send a batch command of multiple direct commands at once. Call the method with the proper to set the type of command the batch should be executed as.

member.summary: Event that is fired when a port is changed

member.name: T:Lego.Ev3.Core.SystemCommand
member.summary: Direct commands for the EV3 brick

member.name: M:Lego.Ev3.Core.SystemCommand.WriteFileAsync(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Write a file to the EV3 brick
member.remarks: devicePath is relative from "lms2012/sys" on the EV3 brick. Destination folders are automatically created if provided in the path. The path must start with "apps", "prjs", or "tools".

member.name: M:Lego.Ev3.Core.SystemCommand.CopyFileAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copy a local file to the EV3 brick
member.remarks: devicePath is relative from "lms2012/sys" on the EV3 brick. Destination folders are automatically created if provided in the path. The path must start with "apps", "prjs", or "tools".

member.name: M:Lego.Ev3.Core.SystemCommand.CreateDirectoryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Create a directory on the EV3 brick
member.remarks: devicePath is relative from "lms2012/sys" on the EV3 brick. Destination folders are automatically created if provided in the path. The path must start with "apps", "prjs", or "tools".

member.name: M:Lego.Ev3.Core.SystemCommand.DeleteFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Delete file from the EV3 brick
member.remarks: devicePath is relative from "lms2012/sys" on the EV3 brick. The path must start with "apps", "prjs", or "tools".
